author: amineoth
title: Decentralized Impact Incubation
description:
Without communities, blockchain ecosystems and decentralization could not take hold. 
We need to Build and educate a community.
solution: A decentralised governance experience through an avant-gardiste incubation program in Tunisia that aim to educate and build an eco-system.
experience: Relevant experience in advisory, accompanying local structures to use blockchain technology for tackling their problems.
